channel.title: Ffprobe on Max Sharabayko Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ffprobe on Max Sharabayko Blog

item.title: Video Frame Sizes Visualization
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll walk through how to use Python and Bokeh to visualize video frame sizes (H.264/AVC, H.265/HEVC, etc.) and calculate moving average bitrate values from an MPEG TS file. We’ll use ffprobe to extract frame information and pandas for data manipulation. Finally, we’ll create interactive plots with Bokeh.
